item.description:
Sooo, looking forward to this sequel. Time may change a bit when the movie schedule comes out. We'll see if there is an imax offering too.


*** UPDATE ****
We are going to pass on the Imax - that requires assigned seating and would be too cumbersome to coordinate ahead of time. We will be going for the 8 PM showing in the "Digital Projection" theatre. I have heard rumors this is selling out. So, if you have the means I would advise getting a ticket ahead of time - either in person a few hours before the show or you can go to: http://www.movieticke... and when there, Iron Man2, Showcase Cinemas Buckland Hills (in Manchester), and 8:00 PM.

We plan on heading into the theatre by no later than 7:45 PM. So please show up by then. We will meet in front of Chatters resturaunt inside. I will send my cell number out on Friday to the Yes's and Maybe's.

Rich
*************
item.how_to_find_us: meet in front of Chatters inside the theatre
item.name: Iron Man 2
